thread.title: Davos panel discussion looks at investing in frontier markets

title: Davos panel discussion looks at investing in frontier markets
text:
Davos panel discussion looks at investing in frontier markets Thursday, February 01, 2018 - 69:29 
DAVOS - Reuters leads a panel discussion at the World Economic Forum in Davos which looks at investing in frontier markets. PANELISTS: Mustafa Abdel-Wadood, Managing Partner & Head of Private Equity, The Abraaj Group; Claver Gatete, Minister of Finance and Economic Planning, Rwanda; Claudia Cooper Fort, Minister of Economy and Finance, Peru; Anna Marrs, CEO, East Asia Private Banking, Standard Chartered; Carlos Pascual, Senior Vice President, Global Energy, International Affairs, IHS Markit   
DAVOS - Reuters leads a panel discussion at the World Economic Forum in Davos which looks at investing in frontier markets. PANELISTS: Mustafa Abdel-Wadood, Managing Partner & Head of Private Equity, The Abraaj Group; Claver Gatete, Minister of Finance and Economic Planning, Rwanda; Claudia Cooper Fort, Minister of Economy and Finance, Peru; Anna Marrs, CEO, East Asia Private Banking, Standard Chartered; Carlos Pascual, Senior Vice President, Global Energy, International Affairs, IHS Markit  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/01/davos-panel-discussion-looks-at-investin?videoId=390286696&videoChannel=13422
